message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value you place on the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1500000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1750000. I believe the product's value is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still feel that $1500000 is the maximum I can realistically pay for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
